result.execSummary:
The defendant Robert R Hennes Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant to pay by 4/25/16. Failure to make payments when due will result in 1 day in the Ozaukee Co Jail for every $25 outstanding.
Defendant to submit to a DNA sample at the Ozaukee Co Jail by 05/05/16.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert R Hennes Jr

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Robert R Hennes in court.  Jeffrey A Sisley appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State advises an agreement has been made. Defendant files plea questionnaire. Court examines defendant on plea questionnaire.  Defendant changes plea to no contest.  Court accepts change of plea & finds defendant guilty.  Court renders sentence.
w/conditions: no operation of a motor vehicle w/o license

Defendant Robert R Hennes in court.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court advises of penalties. State recommends $500 signature bond w/conditions. Court sets bail. Defendant to have pretrial conference with DAs office. Court breaks for defendant to fill out waiver of right to attorney form. 8:52 a.m. case recalled; same appearances. Defendant files waiver. Court examines defendant and accpets said waiver.  Adjourned plea hearing scheduled for April 5, 2016 at 01:15 pm.
